name: Group Shmup project
description:
This project is a 4 level 2D space shooter that has a big boss at the end with a new ammo type of missile. The issues  that came up with this game was the collaboration using git pushes and pull. Also having the big boss spawn enemies at random times was also tricky.

repo: https://github.com/sergey-hovhannisyan/YOLO-GameDev-Group-Project
